verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah <WH3414> from the LORD <WH3068>, when Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and all his army <WH2428>, and all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> of his dominion <WH3027> <WH4475>, and all the people <WH5971>, fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and against all the cities <WH5892> thereof, saying <WH559>, of his: Heb. the dominion of his hand

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Go <WH1980> and speak <WH559> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and tell <WH559> him, Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Behold, I will give <WH5414> this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall burn <WH8313> it with fire <WH784>:

And thou shalt not escape out <WH4422> of his hand <WH3027>, but shalt surely <WH8610> be taken <WH8610>, and delivered <WH5414> into his hand <WH3027>; and thine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> the eyes <WH5869> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall speak <WH1696> with thee mouth <WH6310> to mouth <WH6310>, and thou shalt go <WH935> to Babylon <WH894>. he shall: Heb. his mouth shall speak to thy mouth

Yet hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>, O Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>; Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of thee, Thou shalt not die <WH4191> by the sword <WH2719>:

But thou shalt die <WH4191> in peace <WH7965>: and with the burnings <WH4955> of thy fathers <WH1>, the former <WH7223> kings <WH4428> which were before <WH6440> thee, so shall they burn <WH8313> odours for thee; and they will lament <WH5594> thee, saying, Ah <WH1945> lord <WH113>! for I have pronounced <WH1696> the word <WH1697>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.
Then Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spake <WH1696> all these words <WH1697> unto Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389>,

When the king <WH4428> of Babylon's <WH894> army <WH2428> fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and against all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> that were left <WH3498>, against Lachish <WH3923>, and against Azekah <WH5825>: for these defenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892> remained <WH7604> of the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>.

This is the word <WH1697> that came unto Jeremiah <WH3414> from the LORD <WH3068>, after <WH310> that the king <WH4428> Zedekiah <WH6667> had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with all the people <WH5971> which were at Jerusalem <WH3389>, to proclaim <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> unto them;

That every man <WH376> should let his manservant <WH5650>, and every man <WH376> his maidservant <WH8198>, being an Hebrew <WH5680> or an Hebrewess <WH5680>, go <WH7971> free <WH2670>; that none should serve <WH5647> himself of them, to wit, of a Jew <WH3064> his brother <WH251>.

Now when all the princes <WH8269>, and all the people <WH5971>, which had entered <WH935> into the covenant <WH1285>, heard <WH8085> that every one <WH376> should let his manservant <WH5650>, and every one <WH376> his maidservant <WH8198>, go <WH7971> free <WH2670>, that none should serve <WH5647> themselves of them any more, then they obeyed <WH8085>, and let them go <WH7971>.

But afterward <WH310> they turned <WH7725>, and caused the servants <WH5650> and the handmaids <WH8198>, whom they had let go <WH7971> free <WH2670>, to return <WH7725>, and brought them into subjection <WH3533> <WH3533> for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids <WH8198>.
Therefore the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the LORD <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; I made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondmen <WH5650>, saying <WH559>,

At the end <WH7093> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> let ye go <WH7971> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251> an Hebrew <WH5680>, which hath been sold <WH4376> unto thee; and when he hath served <WH5647> thee six <WH8337> years <WH8141>, thou shalt let him go <WH7971> free <WH2670> from thee: but your fathers <WH1> hearkened <WH8085> not unto me, neither inclined <WH5186> their ear <WH241>. hath been: or, hath sold himself

And ye were now <WH3117> turned <WH7725>, and had done <WH6213> right <WH3477> in my sight <WH5869>, in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> every man <WH376> to his neighbour <WH7453>; and ye had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> me in the house <WH1004> which is called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>: now: Heb. to day which: Heb. whereupon my name is called

But ye turned <WH7725> and polluted <WH2490> my name <WH8034>, and caused every man <WH376> his servant <WH5650>, and every man <WH376> his handmaid <WH8198>, whom ye had set <WH7971> at liberty <WH2670> at their pleasure <WH5315>, to return <WH7725>, and brought them into subjection <WH3533>, to be unto you for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids <WH8198>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Ye have not hearkened <WH8085> unto me, in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty <WH1865>, every one <WH376> to his brother <WH251>, and every man <WH376> to his neighbour <WH7453>: behold, I proclaim <WH7121> a liberty <WH1865> for you, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, to the sword <WH2719>, to the pestilence <WH1698>, and to the famine <WH7458>; and I will make <WH5414> you to be removed <WH2189> <WH2113> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>. to be: Heb. for a removing

And I will give <WH5414> the men <WH582> that have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant <WH1285>, which have not performed <WH6965> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which they had made <WH3772> before <WH6440> me, when they cut <WH3772> the calf <WH5695> in twain <WH8147>, and passed <WH5674> between the parts <WH1335> thereof,

The princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063>, and the princes <WH8269> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, the eunuchs <WH5631>, and the priests <WH3548>, and all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, which passed <WH5674> between the parts <WH1335> of the calf <WH5695>;

I will even give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341>, and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life <WH5315>: and their dead bodies <WH5038> shall be for meat <WH3978> unto the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>, and to the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>.

And Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and his princes <WH8269> will I give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341>, and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life <WH5315>, and into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon's <WH894> army <WH2428>, which are gone up <WH5927> from you.

Behold, I will command <WH6680>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, and cause them to return <WH7725> to this city <WH5892>; and they shall fight <WH3898> against it, and take <WH3920> it, and burn <WH8313> it with fire <WH784>: and I will make <WH5414> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> a desolation <WH8077> without an inhabitant <WH3427>.
